context: A motor vehicle is running on an expressway with variable speeds and must maintain specified distances from the vehicle ahead in the same lane.

MTL_expressions.description: When running above 100 kmph, vehicle should maintain 100 meters distance from the vehicle in front in the same lane

propositions.description: Vehicle is running at a speed which exceeds 100 kilometers per hour
Vehicle is maintaining a distance of 100 meters or more from the vehicle in front in the same lane

MTL_expressions.description: When running below 100 kmph, vehicle should maintain a minimum of 50 meters distance from the vehicle in front in the same lane

propositions.description: Vehicle is running at a speed which is less than 100 kilometers per hour
Vehicle is maintaining a distance which may be less than 100 meters but not less than 50 meters from the vehicle in front in the same lane

non_formalized_parts.reason_for_non_formalization: The term 'appropriately' is subjective and context-dependent, thus cannot be formalized without specific values.
